title: Two dead in train – motorcycle collision
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Two people died under tragic accident after a motorcycle collided with a train at a railway crossing in Balapitiya.
The Railways Control Room stated that the ‘Rajarata Rajina’ train traveling from Anuradhapura to Beliatta had collided with a motorcycle.
The tragedy took place when the motorcycle attempted to pass, even thought the warning signals were active.
